title: IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Senior Project Engineer Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur (IIT Kanpur) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Project Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Tech. Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interestd and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of a...
